structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: No proceedings shall be required for the acquisition, establishment or management of any recreational project or the issuance of bonds under KRS 97.100 to 97.230 except the proceedings prescribed in those sections.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741-25.
